pollInterval.title: Poll Interval (seconds)
pollInterval.description: How often to check for updates from the Neakasa cloud

deviceName.title: Device Name
deviceName.description: Display name for the device in HomeKit

showChildLock.title: Child Lock
showChildLock.description: Prevents the device from being operated manually. Shows as a Lock in HomeKit.

showAutoBury.title: Auto Bury Switch
showAutoBury.description: Automatically covers waste after cat use

showAutoLevel.title: Auto Level Switch
showAutoLevel.description: Automatically levels the litter after cleaning

showUnstoppableCycle.title: Unstoppable Cycle Switch
showUnstoppableCycle.description: Cleaning cycle won't pause if interrupted

showYoungCatMode.title: Young Cat Mode Switch
showYoungCatMode.description: Adjusts timing for kittens and young cats

showBinStateSensor.title: Bin State Sensor
showBinStateSensor.description: Alerts when waste bin is full or missing. Shows as a Leak Sensor in HomeKit.

showWifiSensor.title: WiFi Signal Sensor
showWifiSensor.description: Shows device WiFi signal strength as a percentage. Shows as a Humidity Sensor in HomeKit.

showCatSensors.title: Cat Weight Sensors
showCatSensors.description: Tracks each cat's last recorded weight. Shows as a Humidity Sensor per cat in HomeKit.

showSandLevelSensor.title: Sand Level State Sensor
showSandLevelSensor.description: Shows detailed sand level (Insufficient, Moderate, Sufficient, Overfilled). Shows as a Contact Sensor in HomeKit.

showFaultSensor.title: Fault / Jammed Alert Sensor
showFaultSensor.description: Alerts when the device is stuck or has a fault (Panels Missing or Interrupted). Shows as a Motion Sensor in HomeKit â€” motion detected means a fault is active.

useImperialUnits.title: Use Imperial Units (lbs)
useImperialUnits.description: Display cat weight in pounds instead of kilograms. Note: Weight is shown as a percentage (%) in HomeKit due to sensor limitations.
